data.name: ReadAppointmentOfficeServiceProviderCsePersonCase1
data.value: select top(1) T1.REASON_CODE, T1.TYPE, T1.[RESULT], T1.APPOINTMENT_DATE, T1.APPOINTMENT_TIME, T1.CREATED_TIMESTAMP, T1.SPD_ID, T1.OFF_ID, T1.OSP_ROLE_CODE, T1.OSP_DATE, T1.APP_TSTAMP, T1.CAS_NUMBER, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.CRO_TYPE, T1.CRO_ID, T5.OFFICE_ID, T5.NAME, T5.OFF_OFFICE, T6.SERVICE_PRVDER_ID, T6.USER_ID from CKT_OFFICE T5 join CKT_SERVICE_PRVDER T6 join CKT_APPOINTMENT T1 on (T1.APP_TSTAMP = @appTstamp) and (T1.CRO_ID is not null) and (T1.CRO_TYPE is not null) and (T1.CSP_NUMBER is not null) and (T1.CAS_NUMBER is not null) and (T1.OSP_DATE is not null) and (T1.OSP_ROLE_CODE is not null) and (T6.SERVICE_PRVDER_ID = T1.SPD_ID) on T5.OFFICE_ID = T1.OFF_ID

data.name: ReadAppointmentOfficeServiceProviderCsePersonCase2
data.value: select top(1) T1.REASON_CODE, T1.TYPE, T1.[RESULT], T1.APPOINTMENT_DATE, T1.APPOINTMENT_TIME, T1.CREATED_TIMESTAMP, T1.SPD_ID, T1.OFF_ID, T1.OSP_ROLE_CODE, T1.OSP_DATE, T1.APP_TSTAMP, T1.CAS_NUMBER, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.CRO_TYPE, T1.CRO_ID, T5.OFFICE_ID, T5.NAME, T5.OFF_OFFICE, T6.SERVICE_PRVDER_ID, T6.USER_ID from CKT_OFFICE T5 join CKT_SERVICE_PRVDER T6 join CKT_APPOINTMENT T1 on (T1.CREATED_TIMESTAMP = @createdTimestamp) and (T1.CRO_ID is not null) and (T1.CRO_TYPE is not null) and (T1.CSP_NUMBER is not null) and (T1.CAS_NUMBER is not null) and (T1.OSP_DATE is not null) and (T1.OSP_ROLE_CODE is not null) and (T6.SERVICE_PRVDER_ID = T1.SPD_ID) on T5.OFFICE_ID = T1.OFF_ID

data.name: ReadCaseCaseRoleCsePerson
data.value: select top(1) CAS_NUMBER, CSP_NUMBER, TYPE, CASE_ROLE_ID, END_DATE from CKT_CASE_ROLE where (CAS_NUMBER = @casNumber) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) order by TYPE desc, TYPE
